snippet: (I know of which I speak, having suffered through the brutal tailspin of the '87 Toronto Blue Jays, who blew a 3.5 game lead over the Tigers with seven to play. By losing the season's final seven games. Including the last three to the Tigers. Acco...
abstract: (I know of which I speak, having suffered through the brutal tailspin of the '87 Toronto Blue Jays, who blew a 3.5 game lead over the Tigers with seven to play. By losing the season's final seven games. Including the last three to the Tigers. According to this list, at least, it was the ninth worst-collapse in baseball history. For now.)
